SLACKLINING

Slacklining[1] refers to the act of walking, running or balancing along a suspended length of flat webbing that is tensioned between two anchors. There are many styles of slacklining, including Urbanlining, Tricklining, Highlining, Slackline yoga, Rodeo lines, and Windlining.

Presenting Louise Lenoble[3]
Return to Balance[4]
Crossing The Chasm Together[5]
Slacklining with Kendra Charts[6]

> Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
> 
> Albert Einstein[7]
